page.title: 06 Living Here.
page.content: I live on the Lakeside estate. I like the park over by the Witches Hat. Ilike living in my house because it is a modern one. Sunday is boring as nobody comes out and theres never anything to do. Nearly all the children at our school live too far away so I play with the children on our street. Sometimes we go to Bankroft Park or play rounders at the bottom of our street. Many of our neighbours are community members and plan Sports Days and things like that. I think there should be more parks and places to play. When I get bored I usually make things like little cushions. Sometimes I wish I lived in a bigger house because there are only three bedrooms in ours. I have to share a room with my brother.
